mn33:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn33:2.1_0: “Ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:2.3_10: na gocarakusalo hoti anavasesadohī ca hoti.
mn33:2.3_11: Ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:2.4_2: ekādasahi aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako abhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:3.1_2: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjituṁ.
mn33:3.3_12: Ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti?
mn33:4.2_2: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ ‘cattāri mahābhūtāni,
mn33:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na rūpaññū hoti.
mn33:5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti?
mn33:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘kammalakkhaṇo bālo, kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍito’ti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn33:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na lakkhaṇakusalo hoti.
mn33:6.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti?
mn33:6.2_3: nappajahati na vinodeti na byantī karoti na anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:6.2_7: nappajahati na vinodeti na byantī karoti na anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:6.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti.
mn33:7.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti?
mn33:7.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:7.3_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
mn33:7.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya nimittaggāhī hoti anubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:7.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
mn33:7.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti.
mn33:8.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti?
mn33:8.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ na vitthārena paresaṁ desetā hoti.
mn33:8.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na dhūmaṁ kattā hoti.
mn33:9.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṁ jānāti?
mn33:9.2_2: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
mn33:9.2_3: te kālena kālaṁ upasaṅkamitvā na paripucchati,
mn33:9.5_0: Tassa te āyasmanto avivaṭañceva na vivaranti,
mn33:9.5_2: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṁ na paṭivinodenti.
mn33:9.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na titthaṁ jānāti.
mn33:10.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṁ jānāti?
mn33:10.2_2: bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne na labhati atthavedaṁ,
mn33:10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na pītaṁ jānāti.
mn33:11.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṁ jānāti?
mn33:11.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn33:11.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na vīthiṁ jānāti.
mn33:12.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti?
mn33:12.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattāro satipaṭṭhāne yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn33:12.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gocarakusalo hoti.
mn33:13.2_3: tatra bhikkhu mattaṁ na jānāti paṭiggahaṇāya.
mn33:13.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anavasesadohī hoti.
mn33:14.1_2: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti?
mn33:14.2_2: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā,
mn33:14.2_3: tesu na mettaṁ kāyakammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:14.3_0: na mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca;
mn33:14.4_0: na mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpeti āvi ceva raho ca.
mn33:14.5_2: bhikkhu ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te na atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:14.6_2: ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu abhabbo imasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjituṁ.
mn33:15.1_0: Ekādasahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako bhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.
mn33:15.3_12: Ye te usabhā gopitaro gopariṇāyakā te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:15.4_2: ekādasahi aṅgehi samannāgato gopālako bhabbo gogaṇaṁ pariharituṁ phātiṁ kātuṁ.

mn33:16.3_12: Ye te bhikkhū therā rattaññū cirapabbajitā saṅghapitaro saṅghapariṇāyakā te atirekapūjāya pūjetā hoti.
mn33:17.2_2: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ sabbaṁ rūpaṁ ‘cattāri mahābhūtāni,
mn33:17.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpaññū hoti.

mn33:18.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu lakkhaṇakusalo hoti.
mn33:19.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti?
mn33:19.2_3: pajahati vinodeti byantī karoti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:19.2_7: pajahati vinodeti byantī karoti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
mn33:19.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsāṭikaṁ hāretā hoti.

mn33:20.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.

mn33:20.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī.
mn33:20.9_0: Yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjati,
mn33:20.10_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vaṇaṁ paṭicchādetā hoti.

mn33:21.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ vitthārena paresaṁ desetā hoti.

mn33:27.8_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
